title-group.article-title: ERROR CONTROL AND ADAPTIVITY FOR A VARIATIONAL MODEL PROBLEM DEFINED ON FUNCTIONS OF BOUNDED VARIATION

abstract.p: We derive a fully computable, optimal a posteriori error estimate for the finite element approximation of a total variation regularized model problem and devise an adaptive refinement strategy. Numerical experiments reveal a significant improvement over related approximations on uniformly refined triangulations.
